item.title: Office hours
item.description:
Monday 12:45 - 15:15
Tuesday 11:45 - 13:15
Wednesday 10:45 - 13:15
Thursday 9:45 - 11:15
Office hours will start on Tuesday 17 March.

I will use Google Classroom for my office hours. Please go to your Google Classroom and click on the assignment “Virtual Office” and follow the instruction there.
My office is room 204 in H-4.

// Please remember that the office hours are for questions about the lesson contents. If you intend to come to see me in the office hours, please review your lecture notes and make sure you know what you don’t understand.

item.title: About absence
item.description:
I’m getting a few e-mails about absence. I’d like to remind everyone that:

students have the obligation to attend the lecture;
students have the right to miss 2 lessons for the 45-hour course, 3 lessons for the 60-hour course;
if you are ill or have to go away because of the study-related business, with the presentation of the proof, your absence will be excused;
other reasons do not constitute the reason for your absence;
even with excuse, the number of your absence must not exceed 10.

When you are absent because of your work or some urgent personal matter, I said I will consider the circumstance of your absence, BUT it will be still counted as “absence.” Please remember the item 1) above.
